title: Open Github Event
description: Definition of a publicly listed event.

name.description: Name of the event. Example: 'First Hangout'. (If not given, it will default to <user>/<repo>/#<number-of-event>.)

url.description: URL at which people will be able to meet. Example: 'http://bit.ly/1cSGrkw'.

timeZone.description: IANA Timezone in which start and end are specified. Example: 'Asia/Tokyo'. (Since online location has no timezone attached to it a timezone is required)

place.description: Name or address of location. Example: 'Joyent, Sausolito California'.

directions.description: Instructions on how to find the location. Example: 'Take the elevator Nr. 3 next to the south entrance.'

lat.description: Latitude of the position. Together with lng forms the geographic posistion of the event. Example: '12'

lng.description: Longitude of the position. Together with lat forms the geographic posistion of the event. Example: '140'

endDate.description: Date at which the event ends. Example: '1999-12-31'.

endTime.description: Time at which the event ends. Example: '09-20'. (Specifies together with endDate the finishing time of the event.)

contact.description: Email of the person that is responsible for this event. Example: 'email@example.com'.

url.description: URL to sign-up for the event or get more information. Example: 'http://meetup.com/opengh/events/123'.

coc.description: URL for the Code of Conduct. Example: 'https://nodeschool.io/code_of_conduct.html'.
